Method Detail

analysesMethod

public org.jgentleframework.core.factory.support.MethodAspectPair analysesMethod(MethodInterceptor[] interceptors,
                                                                                 java.util.HashMap<Interceptor,Matcher<Definition>> map,
                                                                                 Definition definition,
                                                                                 java.lang.reflect.Method method)
Analyses method.

Parameters:
interceptors - the given array containing all interceptors
map - the given map containing the interceptors according to their matchers.
definition - the definition of target class declaring the given method.
method - the given method
Returns:
returns the corresponding MethodAspectPair if the interceptors according to given method are existed, if not returns null.

analysesField

public org.jgentleframework.core.factory.support.FieldAspectPair analysesField(FieldInterceptor[] interceptors,
                                                                               java.util.HashMap<Interceptor,Matcher<Definition>> map,
                                                                               Definition definition,
                                                                               java.lang.reflect.Field field)
Analyses field.

Parameters:
interceptors - the given array containing all interceptors
map - the given map containing the interceptors according to their matchers.
definition - the definition of target class declaring the given field.
field - the given field
Returns:
returns the corresponding FieldAspectPair if the interceptors according to the given field are existed, if not, returns null.
